definitions.definition: Relating to, resembling, or situated on an axis
Belonging to the axis of the body, or to the axis of any appendage or organ
In the same direction as the axis, parallel to the axis.
examples: The secondary xylem usually consists of axial and radial elements.

definitions.definition: Oriented parallel to the axis running through the centre of a cyclohexane ring, as opposed to equatorial . See Axial bond .

main_definition: Relating to, resembling, or situated on an axis
secondary_definitions: ( anatomy ) Belonging to the axis of the body, or to the axis of any appendage or organ
( botany ) In the same direction as the axis, parallel to the axis.
( physical chemistry , organic chemistry ) Oriented parallel to the axis running through the centre of a cyclohexane ring, as opposed to equatorial . See Axial bond .
